song.title: Amok [track 2 - "progress"]
song.info:
Done with Jesper Kyd's misc collection of synths. The game featured a quite unique voxel 3D landscape routine (very scene-ish :) pixelled by JADE with an additional y-map. [url=http://www.mobygames.com/game/amok]AMOK at Mobygames[/url] Code by SÃ¸ren Hansen (Hannibal), graphics by Jacob Andersen (J.A.D.E.).
/pwl
